663690.name: Rival Rampage
663690.description:
Rival Rampage is an online multiplayer game in which players shoot and drift around the chaotic streets of Strife City, a hub for crime, secret societies, paranormal activities and lots’a *CHA-CHING*!

Join a gang of troublemakers and spread anarchy on the streets. With the help of your teammates, a selection of chaos-inducing weapons, and lots of cars out for stealing, explore this city of law and crime and leave your (explosion) mark on the streets!

New Co-op RAMPAGE game mode

You are a crook, causing chaos in the Strife City and completing tasks given by the Shay Kath. Join your friends and have fun wrecking enemy Cops and get the Job Done!

Features

  • Play with your friends as a havoc-inducing Crook and fight against the law-abiding Cops

  • A bunch of modifiable weapons to take control of the streets

  • Different cars with various attributes to help you chase or get away

  • Up to 4 players per game

  • Host your own server or join someone else through the server browser or your friend's list

  • Teamwork is key to getting the job done

  • Adopt creatures to accompany you on your endeavours
